Name: Mystic Reversal
Story Background: In a moment of imminent danger, the master wizard deftly unraveled the enemy's spell, redirecting its chaotic energies back upon the caster.
Ability: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, its controller may cast it without paying its mana cost during their next turn.
Appearance Description: The card features a wizard casting a spell, surrounded by swirling arcane energies being redirected back at the original caster. The predominant colors are deep blue and silver, with intricate geometric patterns interwoven in the artwork.
